portfolio.title: Dictionary
portfolio.description: A dictionary app that allows you to search for words and see their definitions. It is built with React and the Merriam-Webster dictionary API and Pexels API.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A weather app that allows you to search for a city and see the current weather and the forecast for the next 5 days. It is built with React and the OpenWeather API.

portfolio.title: Fit-Club Gym
portfolio.description: A fit-club - gym webpage project that uses Create React App and provides an interactive experience through the use of number counters and framer-motion.

portfolio.title: BadAss + Creative Agency
portfolio.description: A landing page for the fictional BadAss Creative Agency, built with HTML, CSS and React in a few hours for coding practice.

portfolio.title: UN Women NGO page
portfolio.description: This project was created as an entry for the SHECODES.io contest. It is a tribute to UN Women and their work to empower women and girls around the world.It aims to highlight the important issues that UN Women works on and encourage visitors to get involved and support their efforts.

portfolio.title: Jackson Wang Tribute Page
portfolio.description: This project is a tribute to the talented singer Jackson Wang. The website aims to showcase his musical career, achievements and style. Built using HTML, CSS, Greensock and Three.js, it offers a unique and interactive experience for fans of Jackson Wang.

portfolio.title: Glassmorphism Todo App
portfolio.description: Elevate your task management experience with this sleek Todo App. Crafted with React and adorned with the contemporary Glassmorphism design, it offers a modern and intuitive user interface. Features include Glassmorphism Aesthetics, task prioritization, persistent memory, interactive UX, and full responsiveness.

portfolio.title: My V-Card Project
portfolio.description: This repository contains the code for a personal v-card project. This is a small web project consisting of HTML and CSS, created as a task for the BeCode coding bootcamp.

portfolio.title: Dark Kitchen Online Delivery - Fergelishos
portfolio.description: A dynamic single-page restaurant menu application designed for a Dark Kitchen online delivery service. It includes features such as responsive design, dish listing, categorization, and a shopping cart. Developed as part of BeCode challenges by a team including Oana, Louis, and Florentina.

portfolio.title: Weather Application
portfolio.description: This project is a weather application that allows users to search for current weather data for any city, as well as retrieve weather data based on their current geolocation. Features include search by city name, auto-location detection, display of various weather data, dynamic weather icons, a history of recent searches, and the ability to clear search history. It uses the OpenWeatherMap and OpenCage Geocoder APIs.

portfolio.title: Ghilbi Movies Collection
portfolio.description: Ghilbi Movies Collection is a dynamic, playful, and interactive web-based collection of Ghilbi Movies. Built as part of BeCode training, the project focuses on JavaScript consolidation concepts. The interface allows seamless navigation and interaction, providing a detailed view of each movie in the collection.
